images.copyright: Dr. Anna Howard Shaw leading a suffrage parade in 1910s New York City (© Bettmann/Getty Images)
images.title: Women's History Month
images.caption: Women's History Month
images.desc: Every March, as we celebrate Women's History Month, we honor the trailblazing women who've shaped our world. Central to this legacy is the suffrage movement—a courageous fight for women's right to vote.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
tooltips.walls: Download this image. Use of this image is restricted to wallpaper only.
